== Main inclusion report for libmpcdec ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' `http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libm/libmpcdec`, compiled on all arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' New build dependency of `gstreamer0.8`.

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* No executables.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: only a library, no end user tool.
* Bugs: no Debian bugs
* No special hardware interaction.
* Free license, upstream claims that the code does not have patents.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `debhelper` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian library and package policy met.
